alert.note: Alert for Hendricks; Morgan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 3:49PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Morgan and southern Hendricks Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 348 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Danville, or 24 miles west of Indianapolis, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Danville around 405 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Plainfield. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 61 and 65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
